name: Quick Google Analytics
author: Eric-Oliver Mächler

sections.description:
The quick solution for adding your Google Analytics Code into your header.php file – without coding.

Add the New gtag.js into your header.php file

NEW

Google Analytics 4 Functions!!

Features

  • Add UA-Code to your Header File
  • IP Anonymizing Yes or No
  • A switch Button between the old UA-Code and the new G-Code
sections.faq:
Wie merke ich, ob es eine neue Version des Plugins gibt?

Dann wird man im Plugin Ordner deiner WP Installation auf die Upgrade-Möglichkeit aufmerksam gemacht.

Was muss ich tun, wenn ich ein Bug bemerke?

Man schickt dem Entwickler eine eMail an eric@chefblogger.me und meldet den Bug und wie man ihn nachvollziehen kann.
sections.changelog:
v1.3.5 (08/24/2024)

  • remove old google analytics universal fields

v1.3.4 (10/10/2023)

  • with the next plugin update – the google analytics universal settings will be deleted

v1.3.2 (06/05/2022)

  • Version update for WP 6

v1.3.1 (2/17/2022)

  • Version update for WP 5.9

v1.3 (11/11/2020)

  • Now also available for Google Analytics 4

v1.2.2 (8/13/2020)

  • Update for WordPress 5.5

v1.2.1 (12/10/2018)

  • Tested up for WordPress 5.0 and Gutenberg

v1.2 (10/28/2018)

  • Add IP Anonymized Function

v1.0 (10/27/2018)

  • Release to Public

v0.1 (02/15/2016)

  • Created

short_description: Add your Google Analytics GA4 Code into your Website and you can use Google Analytics for your daily statistic analysis
